description:
Youka (Yang Guo or Yang Gor) is small boy without parents who lives with his surrogate uncle Guo Jing. He whishes two things - find truth about death of his father and learn kung fu.
Noone wanted to help him so he decided to leave them, and started to live in cave with his master of kung fu - young girl Xiao Long Nu (Dragon Lady).
name: Yang Guo
